title: Apple crumble cake
ingredients: ['100g butter', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '150g plain flour', '50g cornflour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '3 eggs', '2 tablespoons vanilla sugar', '1/2 teaspoon lemon zest', '6 apples, peeled, cored and diced', 'For the crumble', '150g plain flour', '125g butter', '125g sugar', '2 tablespoons vanilla sugar']
